tosdr.case: The service can delete specific content without prior notice and without a reason

title: The service can delete specific content without prior notice and without a reason
quoteText: Although the Society does not routinely monitor the postings to the Service, the Society reserves the right (but assumes no obligation) to delete, move, or edit any Your Content that comes to its attention that Society considers in its sole discretion to be unacceptable or inappropriate, whether for legal or other reasons.
